description_en: Mean and median gross monthly household income by state from 1970 to 2022.
description_ms: Purata dan penengah pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah mengikut negeri dari 1970 hingga 2022.
methodology_en:
Data on individual salaries and wages [in the formal economy](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/formal-sector-wages) is easy to obtain from administrative records. However, data on household income is more difficult to tabulate, as it requires the correct definition of a statistical household, as well as the inclusion of non-salary sources of income such as property income, dividends, and interest. For this reason, it requires the use of a representative survey or census.

 In Malaysia, data on household income (as well as expenditure and access to basic amenities) is collected through the Household Income and Expenditure Survey (HIES), which is conducted at least twice within any 5-year period. The data shown here was tabulated from household-level HIES records spanning 1970 to 2022 (the latest edition). For a full description of the methodology, please refer to the [technical notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
methodology_ms:
Data mengenai gaji dan upah individu [dalam ekonomi formal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/formal-sector-wages) mudah diperoleh daripada rekod pentadbiran. Sebaliknya, data mengenai pendapatan isi rumah lebih sukar untuk dihasilkan, kerana ia memerlukan definisi statistik yang tepat bagi isi rumah, serta sumber pendapatan bukan gaji seperti pendapatan hartanah, dividen, dan faedah. Oleh itu, ia memerlukan penggunaan survei atau banci.

Di Malaysia, data mengenai pendapatan isi rumah (serta perbelanjaan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas) dikumpul melalui Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES), yang dilaksanakan sekurang-kurangnya dua kali dalam mana-mana tempoh 5 tahun. Data yang dipaparkan di sini telah dihasilkan daripada rekod HIES peringkat isi rumah dari tahun 1970 hingga 2022 (edisi terkini). Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila rujuk kepada [nota teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
caveat_en:
This data presents nominal values, i.e. they have not been adjusted for inflation. Furthermore, given that the data is produced from surveys spanning over half a century, the following methodological changes should be noted:
 - Data for 1970 and 1974 refers to Peninsular Malaysia only. 1976 was the first year in which Sabah and Sarawak were included in the survey.
 - Data from 1989 onwards refers to Malaysian citizens only. Although non-citizens are also included in the surveys, the official statistics (which form the basis for national welfare policy) are based on citizens only
 - Kuala Lumpur was gazzeted as a Federal Territory on 1 February 1974. Accordingly, data for W.P. Kuala Lumpur is only available from 1976. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Kuala Lumpur was included under Selangor.
 - Labuan was gazetted as a Federal Territory on 16 April 1984. However, due to limitations in sampling, data for W.P. Labuan is only available from 2007. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Labuan was included under Sabah.
 - Putrajaya was gazzeted as a Federal Territory on 1 February 2001. However, due to limitations in sampling, data for W.P. Putrajaya is only available from 2007. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Putrajaya was included under Selangor.
caveat_ms:
Data ini menunjukkan nilai nominal, iaitu mereka tidak diselaraskan untuk inflasi. Selain itu, memandangkan bahawa data ini dihasilkan daripada survey yang menjangkau lebih dari setengah abad, perubahan metodologi berikut harus diberi perhatian:
 - Data untuk 1970 dan 1974 merujuk kepada Semenanjung Malaysia sahaja. Tahun 1976 adalah tahun pertama di mana Sabah dan Sarawak disekalikan dalam tinjauan.
 - Mulai 1989, data merujuk kepada warganegara Malaysia sahaja. Walaupun warga asing juga disekalikan dalam tinjauan, statistik rasmi (yang menjadi asas untuk dasar nasional) hanya berdasarkan warganegara sahaja.
 - Kuala Lumpur diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 1 Februari 1974. Oleh itu, data untuk W.P. Kuala Lumpur hanya tersedia mulai 1976. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Kuala Lumpur adalah sebahagian daripada Selangor.
 Labuan diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 16 April 1984. Namun, disebabkan oleh kekangan dalam pengsampelan, data bagi W.P. Labuan hanya tersedia mulai 2007. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Labuan adalah sebahagian daripada Sabah.
 - Putrajaya diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 1 Februari 2001. Namun, disebabkan oleh kekangan dalam pengsampelan, data bagi W.P. Putrajaya hanya tersedia mulai 2007. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Putrajaya adalah sebahagian daripada Selangor.
publication_en: The [Household Income Survey Report, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), the latest edition of the household income statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on household income](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) which enables you to explore Malaysia's household income data interactively.
publication_ms: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik pendapatan isi rumah yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM juga membekalkan [_dashboard_ pendapatan isi rumah](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) yang membolehkan anda menerokai data pendapatan isi rumah Malaysia secara interaktif.
